timeline.bodyText: nit: This timeout seems pretty short - are you sure it's enough?
timeline.author: kurtisvg

replies.bodyText: I've used this timeout for a few samples and never had an issue. Is that enough evidence?
replies.author: averikitsch

replies.bodyText:
I would recommend more like 1-2 seconds, as some metadata servers don't always respond when first starting up (I know I occasionally this this problem on GKE, but maybe isn't an issue for RUN).
I'll leave it up to you.
replies.author: kurtisvg
